divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to smoke like I do every night and there was a pinkish orb in the distance; I noticed it and kinda' paid attention, then as I looked up, it just disappeared slowly, then was back..then did the same thing again. This went on for about 10 min. I watch the sky every night....this was something I've never seen before.
Summary: I went outside to smoke like I do every night and there was a pinkish orb in the distance; I noticed it and kinda' paid attention, then as I looked up, it just disappeared slowly, then was back..then did the same thing again.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Rogers
There were no other sightings in Rogers on or around May 7th 2012
